bibl.title: Magister Monetae. Studies in Honour of Jørgen Steen Jensen

bibl.seg: Erik Christiansen, Three Faiyûm Hoards of Alexandrian Tetradrachms.

Michael Andersen, Helle W. Horsnaes & Jens Christian Moesgaard (edd.), Magister Monetae. Studies in Honour of Jørgen Steen Jensen = PNM. Publications of the National Museum. Studies in Archaeology and History. 13 (København, 2007) pp. 27-52.
